title: SCF WYSIWYG Field Fragment
description: Type-specific properties for WYSIWYG editor fields

tabs.description: Which editor tabs to show (all, visual only, or text only)

media_upload.description: Show media upload button (1 for yes, 0 for no)

delay.description: Delay TinyMCE initialization until field is clicked (1 for yes, 0 for no)
